segments.text: Jack , I think it's best that I actively ask for the results of interview .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a good idea ! So you don't need to worry about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think so , too . What do you think about that I write a letter of inquiry to the company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's OK . You could send an email to the employer via the internet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good idea . It is convenient and fast .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You could inquire about the results directly , but should be politely .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think the letter of inquiry should be written briefly . If it's too long , I'm afraid the employer won't have time to read it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that about one hundred words are enough .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: After you send the letter of inquiry , you should pay close attention not to miss any reply .
segments.speaker: S2
